analyzed: gzhan du na shin tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, there would be no great delight. This is the conception of non-holding.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then, etc.

original: phyag bya ba ni gang la ni sgrub pa mtha' dag ste gzhan la rag ma las pa'i phyir dang / ched du bya ba la mi ldog pas mngon par sgrub pa nyid ni sgrub pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams so //
analyzed: phyag bya ba ni gang la ni sgrub pa mtha' dag ste gzhan la rag ma las pa'i phyir dang / ched du bya ba la mi ldog pas mngon par sgrub pa nyid ni sgrub pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams so //
translated: The homage is to the one who is the totality of the means of accomplishment, because she is not dependent on another, and to the means of accomplishment, which is the five perfections, because she is the accomplishment that does not turn back from the goal.

original: de dag ces pa ni gnyis char gyis bdag med par rig pa la'o //
analyzed: de dag ces pa ni gnyis char gyis bdag med par rig pa la'o //
translated: The ‚Äúthem‚Äù is in reference to the knowledge of selflessness of both.

original: de'i phyir na zab mo zhes pa de ni gnyen po la de la 'jug pa nyid kyi lam dang bral bar byed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir na zab mo zhes pa de ni gnyen po la de la 'jug pa nyid kyi lam dang bral bar byed par 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if the profound is the path that is free from engaging in the antidote,

original: de'i de la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'gyed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i de la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'gyed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the mƒÅras and so on will not be able to create any obstacles for her.

original: go cha ma byas pa'i 'thab mo pa la pha rol 'thab mo rnams kyis bzhin no zhes pa ni lam gyi rnam par ma tshang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: go cha ma byas pa'i 'thab mo pa la pha rol 'thab mo rnams kyis bzhin no zhes pa ni lam gyi rnam par ma tshang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is like the opponent in a battle who does not don armor. This is the conception of the incompleteness of the path.

original: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse that begins ‚ÄúThus‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi gtso bo ste /
translated: Thus, the perfection of wisdom is the chief of the perfections.

original: de yang gtso bo des 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang gtso bo des 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, that principal does not observe either cyclic existence or nirvana.

original: ji ltar de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis 'khor bar mi ltung la /
analyzed: ji ltar de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis 'khor bar mi ltung la /
translated: How is it that, through the perfections, one does not fall into cyclic existence,

original: de ltar gang zag gi bdag med pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed nas /
analyzed: de ltar gang zag gi bdag med pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed nas /
translated: and, through the selflessness of persons, one does not actualize the limit of reality?

original: gal te gtso bo ma yin na ni dman pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes pa ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gal te gtso bo ma yin na ni dman pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes pa ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: If it were not the principal, one would actualize the limit of reality in a lesser enlightenment. This is the speculation about going by way of another.

original: 'dis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: 'dis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
translated: This is also the case, etc.

original: ji ltar mngon sum du mi byed na /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon sum du mi byed na /
translated: How is it that one does not actualize?

original: ched du bya bas mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: ched du bya bas mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: One does not engage in it by way of a purpose.

original: ched du bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ched du bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o //
translated: A purpose is the desire for complete enlightenment.

original: ji ltar de lngas mi ldog na gang de srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de las ldog pa med de /
analyzed: ji ltar de lngas mi ldog na gang de srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de las ldog pa med de /
translated: If one does not turn back through those five, then one will not turn back from the perfection of wisdom for as long as one lives.

original: de'i don nyid du de la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don nyid du de la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one does not turn back in that way by means of those five, then one does not turn back from that by means of the perfection of wisdom, for as long as one practices in that very meaning.

original: cig @175b shos de rnams kyang de la rjes su gnas pas de rnams kyang mi ldog ste /
analyzed: cig @175b shos de rnams kyang de la rjes su gnas pas de rnams kyang mi ldog ste /
translated: The other ones also do not turn back, because they abide in that.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chu bran thams cad ni chu klung chen por rjes su zhugs nas rgya mtsho chen po nyid du 'gro zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni ched du bya ba log pa'i rnam par rtog pa la /
analyzed: chu bran thams cad ni chu klung chen por rjes su zhugs nas rgya mtsho chen po nyid du 'gro zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni ched du bya ba log pa'i rnam par rtog pa la /
translated: all the small rivers enter into the great river and go to the great ocean itself without turning back.

original: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then again, etc.

original: go cha bgos pa zhes pa 'dis ni bya bar dka' ba nyid du ston pa ste /
analyzed: go cha bgos pa zhes pa 'dis ni bya bar dka' ba nyid du ston pa ste /
translated: This ‚Äúarmor‚Äù shows the difficulty of the task,

original: mtha' yas pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to benefit the infinite.

original: de ltar na yang 'di nyid kho na go char bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'di nyid kho na go char bya ba ste /
translated: However, this very thing is the armor to be worn,

original: 'di lta bu'i bsam pa rgya chen po las gzhan pas rang dang gzhan dag gi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i bsam pa rgya chen po las gzhan pas rang dang gzhan dag gi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: The antidote to that is: because one cannot accomplish the aims of oneself and others by any other means than this vast attitude.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don gang gis kyang mi byed pas bdag nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don du go cha bya'o zhes pa ni nyi tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don gang gis kyang mi byed pas bdag nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don du go cha bya'o zhes pa ni nyi tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The limited conception is: since one does not accomplish the aims of all sentient beings, one should don the armor for the sake of those who are to be disciplined by oneself.

original: sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: The antidote to the conception of variety is equality.

original: de rnams 'dod pa'i mchog tu dga' bar byed pa ste /üîΩde gsungs pa ni ;
analyzed: de rnams 'dod pa'i mchog tu dga' bar byed pa ste / de gsungs pa ni ;
translated: That is the supreme delight of the wish-granting gem,üîΩwhich is stated as follows.

original: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Then again, etc.

original: gdul bar bya ba can gyis sems can rnams la 'dul bar rigs la /
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba can gyis sems can rnams la 'dul bar rigs la /
translated: It is proper to discipline those sentient beings who are to be disciplined.

original: de ltar na yang gang gis dka' ba byed pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na yang gang gis dka' ba byed pa brjod pa ni /
translated: Nevertheless, the one who does what is difficult is stated:

original: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In the same way, etc.

original: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ni ji ltar chos mthun pas so //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ni ji ltar chos mthun pas so //
translated: Why is that? It is by the similarity of the Dharma.

original: nam mkhas nam mkha' lta bu'i sems can rnams dang ji ltar rtsod na /
analyzed: nam mkhas nam mkha' lta bu'i sems can rnams dang ji ltar rtsod na /
translated: How can space, which is like sentient beings, dispute with space?

original: gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: gsungs pa ni /
translated: The answer is:

original: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis also‚Äù and so on.

original: sems can gang gis gdul bar 'dod pa de yang sems can med pa'i phyir yongs su bral bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gang gis gdul bar 'dod pa de yang sems can med pa'i phyir yongs su bral bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: Since sentient beings who are to be disciplined do not exist, they are completely absent.

original: 'thab pa ste rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: 'thab pa ste rtsod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúConflict‚Äù means dispute.

original: ji ltar yang gdul bar bya ba med pa de ltar gdul ba yang de'i shin tu dka' bar byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: ji ltar yang gdul bar bya ba med pa de ltar gdul ba yang de'i shin tu dka' bar byed pa nyid de /
translated: Just as there are no objects of discipline, in the same way, the discipliner is also very difficult to find.

original: de ltar sems can thams cad bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar sems can thams cad bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, all sentient beings should be seen as the same as oneself.

original: gang bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed par nus par 'gyur ba ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed par nus par 'gyur ba ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la /
translated: One who is able to act for the benefit of oneself and others will not be discouraged and will not be lazy.

original: shin tu dga' bar 'gyur nas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni gang gis gang du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shin tu dga' bar 'gyur nas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni gang gis gang du yang ma yin te /
translated: Having become very joyful, one who practices the perfection of wisdom does not do anything anywhere.

original: chos la bdag med pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos la bdag med pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one sees the selflessness of phenomena.

original: 'dir lan ni /
analyzed: 'dir lan ni /
translated: Here is the reply:

original: sems can zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sems can zhes pa ste /
translated: sentient beings.üîΩAll phenomena are isolated and equal.

original: chos thams cad ni dben pa dang mnyam pa nyid ces pa'i rgya chen po ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni dben pa dang mnyam pa nyid ces pa'i rgya chen po ni gnyen po'o //
translated: The vastness is the antidote.

original: sems can sna tshogs dang tshos sna tshogs pa de la @176a * //
analyzed: sems can sna tshogs dang tshos sna tshogs pa de la @176a * //
translated: Various sentient beings and various phenomenaüîΩare the single taste of non-existence, the perfection of wisdom.

original: med pa'i ro gcig pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'i ro gcig pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the conception of variety.

original: de ltar lha'i bu dag la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar lha'i bu dag la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, divine sons and so forth,

original: zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa dag la mi rmongs par 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa dag la mi rmongs par 'gyur ba la /
translated: 'not discouraged' means not confused about the states and engagements.

original: gang gis bgrod par bya ba dang gang du gnas par bya ba zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par rig par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag la des kun tu mi rmongs pas gang gi byang chub pas des bgrod pa byed na byang chub la gnas par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis bgrod par bya ba dang gang du gnas par bya ba zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par rig par bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag la des kun tu mi rmongs pas gang gi byang chub pas des bgrod pa byed na byang chub la gnas par byed pa ste /
translated: By what is it to be traversed and where is it to be abided? This is the perfect knowledge of the equality of all phenomena and the perfection of wisdom. By that, one is not confused about what is to be traversed by the vehicle and where is to be abided in enlightenment.

original: de yang de'i 'gro ba dang gnas pa nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ni rang la dbang yod pa nyid la /
analyzed: de yang de'i 'gro ba dang gnas pa nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ni rang la dbang yod pa nyid la /
translated: Moreover, the state of cause and effect of its going and staying is its own power.

original: des yongs su bsngo bas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis kyang de nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing de nyid du gnas par 'gyur zhes pas ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: des yongs su bsngo bas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams kyis kyang de nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing de nyid du gnas par 'gyur zhes pas ni gnyen po'o //
translated: By dedicating that, the five perfections also go there and stay there.

original: mi mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams dang drug pa spros pa med pa la de'i gnas pa dang 'jug pa dag tu ma nges pa ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa la mrongs pa'i rtog pa la /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams dang drug pa spros pa med pa la de'i gnas pa dang 'jug pa dag tu ma nges pa ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa la mrongs pa'i rtog pa la /
translated: The non-expert is uncertain about the going and staying of the five perfections and the sixth, the absence of conceptual elaborations, in the conceptualization of going and staying.

original: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: In regard to where, etc.,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngon du spyod ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngon du spyod ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: the antidote is having previously practiced the perfection of wisdom.

original: yul rgya chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams la sngon du 'jug pa la yul zhib mo'i phyir rjes la drug pa'o zhes pa ni rjes la 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yul rgya chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams la sngon du 'jug pa la yul zhib mo'i phyir rjes la drug pa'o zhes pa ni rjes la 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: For the sake of the vast object, the five perfections are engaged in first; for the sake of the subtle object, the sixth is engaged in afterwards. This is the subsequent discursive thought.

original: de'i rjes la bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de'i rjes la bstan bcos las /
translated: After that, the treatise states:

original: 'dzin dang so sor sdud pa dang / yid la byed dang khams rnams ni //
analyzed: 'dzin dang so sor sdud pa dang / yid la byed dang khams rnams ni //
translated: Grasping, complete withdrawal, mental orientation, and the elements,üîΩall three are related,üîΩabode, manifest clinging,üîΩconceptualized as the entity of phenomena,üîΩattachment, and the antidote,

original: gsum char nye bar 'brel ba dang // gnas dang mngon par zhen pa dang // chos kyi dngos por brtags pa dang // chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro nyams pa //
analyzed: gsum char nye bar 'brel ba dang // gnas dang mngon par zhen pa dang // chos kyi dngos por brtags pa dang // chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro nyams pa //
translated: deterioration of going as one wishes,

original: 'dzin pa po dang shes par bya //
analyzed: 'dzin pa po dang shes par bya //
translated: grasping, and knowing.

original: zhes te rdzas su yod pa'i bdag tu 'dzin pa po gzhan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang cung zad 'dzin par byed cing cung zad mos par byed do zhes pa ni 'dzin pa dang so sor thar pa'i rnam par rtog pa la /
analyzed: zhes te rdzas su yod pa'i bdag tu 'dzin pa po gzhan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang cung zad 'dzin par byed cing cung zad mos par byed do zhes pa ni 'dzin pa dang so sor thar pa'i rnam par rtog pa la /
translated: The grasping of a substantially existent self is different from the perfection of wisdom. The latter does not grasp anything at all, nor does it believe in anything at all. This is the discursive thought of grasping and complete withdrawal.

original: de yang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / thar par mi byed ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / thar par mi byed ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: Moreover, ‚Äúnot apprehending‚Äù and ‚Äúnot liberating‚Äù are the antidotes.

original: 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyid du chos de rnams yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa la chos de rnams dang bcas pa yid la mi byed ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyid du chos de rnams yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa la chos de rnams dang bcas pa yid la mi byed ces pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNot attending to those phenomena together with the conceptualization that attends to those phenomena as something to be apprehended‚Äù is the antidote.

original: yid la byed pa nyid kyi chos rnams ni khams @176b gsum dang 'brel pas so zhes pa ni khams gsum dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rtog pa la /
analyzed: yid la byed pa nyid kyi chos rnams ni khams @176b gsum dang 'brel pas so zhes pa ni khams gsum dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rtog pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe phenomena that are attended to are connected to the three realms‚Äù is the conceptualization of connection to the three realms.

original: 'dir khams gsum dang 'brel par mi byed do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: 'dir khams gsum dang 'brel par mi byed do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere, one should not connect with the three realms‚Äù is the antidote.üîΩ‚ÄúHow does one who abides in the three realms not connect?‚Äù is the conceptualization of abiding.

original: khams gsum la gnas pa ji ltar 'brel par mi byed ces pa ni gnas kyi rnam par rtog pa la 'dir gang du yang gnas pa med do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: khams gsum la gnas pa ji ltar 'brel par mi byed ces pa ni gnas kyi rnam par rtog pa la 'dir gang du yang gnas pa med do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere, one does not abide anywhere‚Äù is the antidote.

original: bden par mngon par zhen pa la ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bden par mngon par zhen pa la ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHow does one not abide in the clinging to the four truths?‚Äù is the conceptualization of clinging.

original: rnam par rtog pa la 'di la cung zad kyang mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa la 'di la cung zad kyang mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does not settle down at all in conceptualization‚Äù is the antidote.

original: byang chub sems dpa' brtags pa'i dngos po rnams kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du byed pa yod do zhes pa ni brtags pa'i dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa la de yang 'dir yod
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' brtags pa'i dngos po rnams kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du byed pa yod do zhes pa ni brtags pa'i dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa la de yang 'dir yod
translated: ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva does not have the practice of the perfections from generosity up to omniscience‚Äù is the conceptualization of imputed things.

original: pa ma yin no zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: pa ma yin no zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat does not exist here‚Äù is the antidote.

original: chags pa nyid kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chags pa nyid kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúHe is attached to perfect enlightenment‚Äù is the conceptualization of attachment.

original: gzhan du na phyir phyogs so zhes pa ni chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa la //
analyzed: gzhan du na phyir phyogs so zhes pa ni chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa la //
translated: ‚ÄúHe turns away from the other‚Äù is the antidote.

original: chos thams cad ni chags pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni chags pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAll phenomena are without attachment and without grasping‚Äù is the conceptualization of nonattachment.

analyzed: chags pa med pa la ni cung zad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba med de /
translated: ‚ÄúIn nonattachment, there is no perfect enlightenment‚Äù is the antidote.

original: de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: If one practices in this way, one practices the perfection of wisdom. This is the antidote.üîΩ The antidote to the conception of the side of the remedy is The perfection of giving is empty, etc. This is the antidote.üîΩ The conception of the degeneration of the freedom to go wherever one wishes is All phenomena are not apprehended in any way whatsoever. This is the conception of degeneration.üîΩ The antidote to that is That degeneration does not exist for the bodhisattva.üîΩ The conception of the degeneration of the freedom to go wherever one wishes is All phenomena are not apprehended in any way whatsoever. original: de ltar yang bstan bcos las /
analyzed: de ltar yang bstan bcos las /

original: 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin la //

original: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
analyzed: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //

original: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //
analyzed: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //

original: bar 'gyur ba med la /
analyzed: bar 'gyur ba med la /
translated: Thus in the nature of suchness, nothing is eliminated or produced by conceptions.

original: rigs nyid ni rigs te bye brag go //
analyzed: rigs nyid ni rigs te bye brag go //

analyzed: de la ni rnam par rtog pa skye ba cung zad med ces pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar yang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do //

original: de la bden par yod pa nyid 'dir med pas ci zhig zad la /
analyzed: de la bden par yod pa nyid 'dir med pas ci zhig zad la /
translated: What is it that is exhausted here, since true existence does not exist?

analyzed: kun rdzob tu ni sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu zad cing yang skye ba med par nye bar bstan pa'o //

original: gang zhig gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa med pa'i gnyis su med pa'o //

original: rang rig don dam pa pa la yod ces pa mngon par zhen par byed pa dang / gang yang phung po lnga rnams don dam par yod ces pa de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
analyzed: rang rig don dam pa pa la yod ces pa mngon par zhen par byed pa dang / gang yang phung po lnga rnams don dam par yod ces pa de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /

analyzed: chos rnams yod ces bya ba dang // shes bya la yang ston pa yi // sgrib pa zad par 'dod pa yi //

original: ston pas gzhan du brjod pa gang //
analyzed: ston pas gzhan du brjod pa gang //

analyzed: 'di la kho bos mtshar du brtsis // 'di la bsal ba gang yang med //
translated: I find this amazing!üîΩThere is nothing to be removed

original: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
analyzed: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //

original: yang dag mthong ba rnam par grol //
analyzed: yang dag mthong ba rnam par grol //

analyzed: zhes te zhes bya ba dang sgra yis rnam par spyod pa'o //

analyzed: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ma spangs pas kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste /

analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'di la gzhag pa cung zad med pa ni chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis med pa'i phyir ro //

original: yang dag pa nyid kyis blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid kyis blta bar bya ste /
translated: One should see reality as it is in reality by means of the essencelessness of those.

original: gang du yang dag pa mthong na nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang du yang dag pa mthong na nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams mthong ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //

analyzed: de rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du mthong ba ni gnyen po'o //

analyzed: de ltar na sgyu ma'i glang pos gzhan sgyu ma'i glang po las rgyal ba bzhin phyin ci log bzlog nas de kho na mthong ba can no //

original: de lta bas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: byang chub dang de thob pa'i rgyu yang zhar la bshad la /
analyzed: byang chub dang de thob pa'i rgyu yang zhar la bshad la /

analyzed: rang bzhin ni mthong ba'i lam gyi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams spong la /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: dus gsum pa can gyi de'i rnam par rtog pa gsum ste /
analyzed: dus gsum pa can gyi de'i rnam par rtog pa gsum ste /
translated: The three conceptions of the three times are the three conceptions of the three times.

original: de rnams kyi gnyen po ni rjes su bsngags pa med pa rjes su gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnyen po ni rjes su bsngags pa med pa rjes su gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //

original: de'i rjes su bsngags pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dang / sbyor ba dang mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgom par byed ces pas go rims bzhin du legs pa'i lam ste /

translated: The praise in the aftermath is the practice of the perfection of wisdom, and the application, the accomplishment, and the cultivation of that are the path of the good, respectively.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba rnam pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba rnam pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa la /
translated: The three types of conceptions are the three types of conceptions that are distinguished by the distinctions of application and so on to the path of nirvana.

original: de rnams kyi gnyen po ni go rims bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa zhi ba dang / dbang du gyur pa dang stong zhing snying po med pas de rnams la spyad par bya ba dang / nam mkha' stong pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /

translated: The antidotes to those are, respectively, the pacification of form, feeling, and so on, the mastery of form, feeling, and so on, and the accomplishment of form, feeling, and so on through the accomplishment of the emptiness of space.

original: nam mkha' stong pa nyid du bsgom pas bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' stong pa nyid du bsgom pas bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: By meditating on space as emptiness, one should meditate.

original: gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /üîΩgnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las / gnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams //
translated: With regard to the second, the treatise states:

original: 'jug pa'i yul can yin bzhed de //üîΩsems mi skyed dang byang chub kyi //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul can yin bzhed de // sems mi skyed dang byang chub kyi //
translated: The second is the domain of engagement of the mind and mental factors.üîΩThe mind that does not generate,üîΩthe non-attention to the essence of enlightenment,

original: snying po yid la mi byed dang // theg pa dman pa yid byed dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid mi byed //
analyzed: snying po yid la mi byed dang // theg pa dman pa yid byed dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid mi byed //
translated: the attention to the lesser vehicle, and the non-attention to perfect enlightenment,üîΩmeditation and non-meditation,

original: bsgom dang bsgom pa med pa dang // de dag las ni bzlog nyid dang // ji bzhin don min rnam rtog pa //
analyzed: bsgom dang bsgom pa med pa dang // de dag las ni bzlog nyid dang // ji bzhin don min rnam rtog pa //
translated: the very reversal of those, and the conceptualization of a meaning that is not as it is

original: bsgom pa'i lam las shes par bya //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam las shes par bya //
translated: should be understood from the path of meditation.

original: zhes te ji tsam du spyod pas 'dir yun ring du spyod par 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i rnam par rtog pa la /
analyzed: zhes te ji tsam du spyod pas 'dir yun ring du spyod par 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i rnam par rtog pa la /
translated: The question how long will one engage in conduct here? refers to the bodhisattva's non-arising conceptualization.

original: lam ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: lam ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ba nyid ces pa'o //
translated: The path is precisely the generation of the first mind.

original: ji srid du byang chub snying po'i bar du yid la byed ces pa ni 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
analyzed: ji srid du byang chub snying po'i bar du yid la byed ces pa ni 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
translated: The phrase until the essence of enlightenment is realized is the counteragent to that.

original: ji ltar 'dir spyod par bya /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir spyod par bya /
translated: How should one practice here?

original: mngon par bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: mngon par bsgrub par bya /
translated: How should one accomplish?

original: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni byang chub snying po'i bar du yid la byed pa ste rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni byang chub snying po'i bar du yid la byed pa ste rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: How should one meditate? is the mental activity until the essence of enlightenment is realized. It is conceptualization.

original: theg pa dman pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi go skabs mi 'byed do zhes pa ni gnyen po la theg pa dman pa dag yid la byed pa ni rnam par rtog pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid @183a * //üîΩla byed pa rab tu rnam par mi 'jog pa nyid kyis 'dir spyod pa de ltar spyad par bya ste /

translated: The phrase one does not create an opportunity for mental activity related to the Lesser Vehicle is the counteragent to that. Mental activity related to the Lesser Vehicle is conceptualization.üîΩOne should practice here in such a way that one does not establish the mental activity of omniscience.

original: ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba mi 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba mi 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni gnyen po'o //
translated: How should one practice here? is the counteragent to that.

original: de ltar na ni rnam par mi 'jug pa nyid do zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la mi byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na ni rnam par mi 'jug pa nyid do zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la mi byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Thus, it does not engage at all is a conceptual thought that does not attend to perfect enlightenment.

original: ji ltar bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: How does one attain the knowledge of all aspects through meditation? is a conceptual thought about meditation.

original: min zhes pa ni gnyen po de ci dmigs pa med pas na ni de ltar na ni dngos po med pa de thob par 'gyur bas zhes pa ni bsgom pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: min zhes pa ni gnyen po de ci dmigs pa med pas na ni de ltar na ni dngos po med pa de thob par 'gyur bas zhes pa ni bsgom pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: No is a conceptual thought about the absence of meditation.

original: de ltar dmigs pa med pa dang dmigs pa med pa ma yin pa dag gis bsgoms pas kyang ma yin la ma bsgoms pas kyang thob par 'gyur ba min zhes pa ni bsgoms pas ma yin pa la sgom pa med pas kyang ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog

analyzed: ji ltar gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su med pa ma yin pa'i chos nye bar dmigs te /
translated: How does one observe nondualistic and non-nondualistic phenomena?

original: de ltar na gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni 'di'i gnyen po la gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa gnyis /
analyzed: de ltar na gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni 'di'i gnyen po la gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa gnyis /
translated: In that way, one attains the subsequent state of nondualistic and non-nondualistic phenomena.

original: de med pa ni kun tu rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni kun tu rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The remedy for that is the conception of nonexistence, which is a form of confusion.

original: 'o na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa rnams snga nas spangs pas ji ltar na 'dir rtogs pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs su spong bar bstan par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa rnams snga nas spangs pas ji ltar na 'dir rtogs pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs su spong bar bstan par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then since these types of conceptions have already been abandoned, how is it that they are taught to be abandoned in this context, the state of the perfection of realization?

original: skyon med de de dag gi phyir phra ba gting ring por zhugs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i gegs byed pa po'i kun tu rmongs pa'i sa bon ni bcu pa la rab tu @185a * //
analyzed: skyon med de de dag gi phyir phra ba gting ring por zhugs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i gegs byed pa po'i kun tu rmongs pa'i sa bon ni bcu pa la rab tu @185a * //
translated: There is no fault, because the seeds of confusion that obstruct the great superknowledges that penetrate the profound and subtle are abandoned on the tenth ground.

original: spong bar 'gyur zhes dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa'i mdo las gsungs pas so //
analyzed: spong bar 'gyur zhes dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa'i mdo las gsungs pas so //
translated: This is stated in the sutras such as the Definitive Explanation of the Intent.

original: yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las drug pa dang bdun pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las drug pa dang bdun pa nas bzung ste /
translated: Again, the Samdhinirmocana says that from the sixth and seventh stagesüîΩon, the manifest afflictions are weak, and the latent afflictions are taken asüîΩthe object of the knowledge of the eighth stage.üîΩThe text says, ‚ÄúThe manifest afflictions are completely eliminated, and the

original: nyon mongs pa mngon du rgyu stobs chung nas bag la nyal la sa brgyad pa la ni bag la nyal las nyon mongs pa'i mngon du rgyu ni shes bya'i sgrib pa la kun tu gnas pa tsam nyid nas nye bar bzung ste zhes pa dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa mngon du rgyu stobs chung nas bag la nyal la sa brgyad pa la ni bag la nyal las nyon mongs pa'i mngon du rgyu ni shes bya'i sgrib pa la kun tu gnas pa tsam nyid nas nye bar bzung ste zhes pa dang /
translated: latent afflictions are taken as the object of the knowledge of the eighth stage.‚Äù

original: gzhung 'grel las kyang sa brgyad pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyon mongs pa'i mngon du rgyu ni shin tu phra ba yang med do zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhung 'grel las kyang sa brgyad pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyon mongs pa'i mngon du rgyu ni shin tu phra ba yang med do zhes pa ste /
translated: The commentary says, ‚ÄúThe bodhisattvas of the eighth stage have no manifest afflictions at all.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, the ignorance that is the essence of the conception of things

original: de lta bas na thog ma med pa can gyi dngos po med pa mngon par zhen pa'i ngo bo'i ma rig pa ni de dang 'gal ba'i ngo bo nyid pa'i shes pas spong zhing de'i kun nas ldang ba'i gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa yang
analyzed: de lta bas na thog ma med pa can gyi dngos po med pa mngon par zhen pa'i ngo bo'i ma rig pa ni de dang 'gal ba'i ngo bo nyid pa'i shes pas spong zhing de'i kun nas ldang ba'i gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa yang
translated: as real that has existed since beginningless time is eliminated by the knowledge that is its opposite. The conception of the apprehended, which is

original: spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: its concomitant, is also eliminated.

original: de ci'i phyir na ma rig pa dang dngos su 'gal ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nges par bsgom par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir na ma rig pa dang dngos su 'gal ba'i byang chub kyi sems ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nges par bsgom par bya ba bstan to //
translated: Why is that? Because the thought of enlightenment, which is the direct opposite of nescience, is taught as that which the Bodhisattvas must cultivate.

original: kha cig gis yang de ltar bshad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa las gzhan du so sor sgrub par byed /
analyzed: kha cig gis yang de ltar bshad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa las gzhan du so sor sgrub par byed /
translated: Some, on the other hand, establish it differently from that explanation.

original: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor ba'i 'dun pa nas kyi sems bskyed pa bcu dgu po rnams la /
analyzed: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sbyor ba'i 'dun pa nas kyi sems bskyed pa bcu dgu po rnams la /
translated: The generation of the thought of enlightenment is nineteen in number, from the will to application which has the nature of the clear realization of all aspects,

original: sems bskyed pa re re zhing sbyor ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa las /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa re re zhing sbyor ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa las /
translated: and in each generation of the thought, the state of the culmination of the perfection of application is the clear realization of the peak.

original: sbyor ba'i go rims kyis gnas skabs nyid ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i go rims kyis gnas skabs nyid ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The state of the order of application is the clear realization by steps.

original: nyi shu pa ni sbyor ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang go rims rnams kyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs te /
analyzed: nyi shu pa ni sbyor ba rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang go rims rnams kyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs te /
translated: The twentieth is the state of the culmination of the perfection of application and the culmination of the order.

original: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: and one moment of timeless awareness is attained.

original: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis lam gyi rtags dang / rnam par 'phel ba dang / brtan pa dang / sems kun tu gnas pa ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog gi ngo bo rnams dang /üîΩrab tu dga' ba'i sa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ma gcig la rnam par rtog pa bzhi'i mngon par rgyu rab tu spong ba'i ngo bor ldog pas rab tu phye ba'i rnam pa bzhi ste skad cig
analyzed: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis lam gyi rtags dang / rnam par 'phel ba dang / brtan pa dang / sems kun tu gnas pa ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog gi ngo bo rnams dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ma gcig la rnam par rtog pa bzhi'i mngon par rgyu rab tu spong ba'i ngo bor ldog pas rab tu phye ba'i rnam pa bzhi ste skad cig
translated: The distinctive features of the process of manifest enlightenment that is, the warmth, the peak experience, patient acceptance and the highest mundane experience are distinguished by the signs of the spiritual path, the enhancement of those signs, their stability and the full presence of mind.üîΩThe distinctive features of the path of seeing are distinguished by the four aspects of the process of elimination, which is to say, the elimination of the four concepts in a single moment of timeless awareness.

original: ma gcig pa 'di nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi de ltar sdug bsngal gyi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par @185b rtog pa rnams kyi rab tu spong bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: ma gcig pa 'di nyid kyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi de ltar sdug bsngal gyi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par @185b rtog pa rnams kyi rab tu spong bar 'gyur la /
translated: In a single moment of timeless awareness, one eliminates the four concepts that are eliminated on the path of seeing, which is to say, the concepts that are eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering in the realm of desire.

original: khams gong ma gnyis ni ci rigs par skad cig ma gzhan rnams kyis te zhes pa mngon par rtogs pa gzhan du bshad de //
analyzed: khams gong ma gnyis ni ci rigs par skad cig ma gzhan rnams kyis te zhes pa mngon par rtogs pa gzhan du bshad de //
translated: The other moments are explained as the other realizations in the two higher realms.

original: de lta na ni skad cig ma dang por yang bshad la /
analyzed: de lta na ni skad cig ma dang por yang bshad la /
translated: If that is so, then it is explained in the first moment,üîΩbut why is it explained here?

original: ci'i phyi yang 'dir bshad ce na dang po la de kho na nyid mthong yang sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams phan tshun med cing shin tu bsdu ba bsgrub par 'dod pas na 'di'i don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci'i phyi yang 'dir bshad ce na dang po la de kho na nyid mthong yang sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams phan tshun med cing shin tu bsdu ba bsgrub par 'dod pas na 'di'i don med pa ma yin no //
translated: Although reality is seen in the first moment, since it is asserted that generosity and so on are mutually absent and extremely condensed, it is not that this has no purpose.

original: 'o na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs su rnam par rtog pa bzhi po ji ltar bstan pa de ltar mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma gcig gi spang byar rnam par rtog pa rnams ci'i phyir ma bstan zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs su rnam par rtog pa bzhi po ji ltar bstan pa de ltar mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma gcig gi spang byar rnam par rtog pa rnams ci'i phyir ma bstan zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then why are the four conceptions not explained as objects to be abandoned by the single moment of the path of seeing as they are taught in the context of omniscience?

original: de dang der 'dul bar bya ba rtogs par 'dod pa med pas zhes pa ste rgya cher spong ba'i dgos pa med de /
analyzed: de dang der 'dul bar bya ba rtogs par 'dod pa med pas zhes pa ste rgya cher spong ba'i dgos pa med de /
translated: Since there is no desire to realize the objects to be subdued there, there is no need to extensively abandon them.

original: bsgom pa'i lam du ni rtogs pa'i bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gcig ste /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam du ni rtogs pa'i bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gcig ste /
translated: On the path of cultivation, there are eighty one specific realizations.

original: de la dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i bye brag drug gis rnam par rtog pa bzhi'i mngon du gyur pas spong bar 'gyur zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de la dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i bye brag drug gis rnam par rtog pa bzhi'i mngon du gyur pas spong bar 'gyur zhes pa ste /
translated: On that path, the four realizations are abandoned by the six specific realizations, such as the stainless.

original: de rnams kyang ldog pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi la/ mi gyo ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams kyis ni rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams dang gzhan yang bag chags kyis de ltar lhag ma rnams spongs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de rnams kyang ldog pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi la/ mi gyo ba la sogs pa'i bye brag rnams kyis ni rnam par rtog pa brgyad rnams dang gzhan yang bag chags kyis de ltar lhag ma rnams spongs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Those four realizations are abandoned by the four specific realizations, such as the unshakable, and by the other specific realizations, such as the stainless.

original: bye brag brgyad cu pa ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: bye brag brgyad cu pa ni bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The eighty one specific realizations are the path of cultivation.

original: rdo rje lta bu dang bar chad med pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu dang bar chad med pa'i lam mo //
translated: The vajra like samadhi is the vajra like path and the uninterrupted path.

original: bye brag gi brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa ni bsgoms pas bgrod par bya ba'i lam ste /
analyzed: bye brag gi brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa ni bsgoms pas bgrod par bya ba'i lam ste /
translated: The eighty one specific realizations are the path traversed by cultivation.

original: de ltar bsgom pa'i lam dang rnam par grol pa'i lam dang / rnam par smin pa dang chos kyi skur rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa'i lam dang rnam par grol pa'i lam dang / rnam par smin pa dang chos kyi skur rnam par gzhag go //
translated: Thus the path of cultivation, the path of liberation and the path of completion are respectively classified as the maturational body, the enjoyment body and the truth body.

original: mngon par rtogs pa gzhan gyi bshad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni 'dir ji ltar rig par shes par bya'o //üîΩ'dir bshad pa'i dang po'i gnas skabs su gnas pa rnams ni 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sde'i dgos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa gzhan gyi bshad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni 'dir ji ltar rig par shes par bya'o // 'dir bshad pa'i dang po'i gnas skabs su gnas pa rnams ni 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sde'i dgos pa ma yin te /
translated: The other presentations of realization should be understood as they are known in other explanations.üîΩThe first stage of explanation here is not the purpose of the noble Vimuktasena.

original: gang yang tshu rol pa yis rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang tshu rol pa yis rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: It is also a presentation by the one from the east.

original: de ltar yang des bshad de /
analyzed: de ltar yang des bshad de /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: bzhi pa'i rtse mo mngon par rtogs pa'i rnam par 'phel ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i rtse mo mngon par rtogs pa'i rnam par 'phel ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: The increase of realization of the peak of the fourth is nonconceptual.üîΩIt is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa dang rtogs pas na ji ltar na sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa dang rtogs pas na ji ltar na sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
translated: If one realizes that, how could one abandon the welfare of sentient beings?

original: de ltar yang dag par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar ltung ba bzlog pa'i don du thugs rje chen pos mngon du @186a * //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar ltung ba bzlog pa'i don du thugs rje chen pos mngon du @186a * //
translated: Thus, in order to prevent the bodhisattva who has realized that from falling into nirvana, with great compassion he manifests

original: byed pa la dgongs pas so zhes pa dang / ji ltar srid pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang / gnyen po dag ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag gi rnam pa bzhi rtogs pa por rnam par bshad pas kyang de rnam pa bzhir bshad pa'o zhes pa ni gcig cig gi zhes pa la sogs pas na sgrib pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: byed pa la dgongs pas so zhes pa dang / ji ltar srid pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang / gnyen po dag ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag gi rnam pa bzhi rtogs pa por rnam par bshad pas kyang de rnam pa bzhir bshad pa'o zhes pa ni gcig cig gi zhes pa la sogs pas na sgrib pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: And since it is explained that the four conceptions of existence and their antidotes are the four aspects of the path of seeing and meditation, they are explained as four.

original: 'dir mthong ba'i lam gyis bzod pa skyes pas 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pas bsdus par skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa brgya rtsa brgyad mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pas yang dag par bsdus pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: 'dir mthong ba'i lam gyis bzod pa skyes pas 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pas bsdus par skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa brgya rtsa brgyad mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pas yang dag par bsdus pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes
translated: Here, since the path of seeing generates perseverance, it abandons the one hundred and eight afflictions subsumed by the desire, form and formless realms that are to be abandoned by the path of seeing, which are subsumed by conception.üîΩThe path of meditation abandons the remaining afflictions.

original: pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas bsdus pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad po gang 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can de'i 'dir ji ltar rigs par spong bar 'gyur zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /
analyzed: pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas bsdus pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad po gang 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba can de'i 'dir ji ltar rigs par spong bar 'gyur zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /
translated: The intention is that the one hundred and eight afflictions subsumed by desire realm and so on are the fetters of the factors conducive to penetrative insight of the desire realm.

original: rnam par bshad pa 'di'i rgyas par ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa 'di'i rgyas par ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa la /
translated: The extensive explanation of this is in the sutra unravelling the intended meaning and so forth.

original: gzhan gyis rnam par bshad pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pas ni 'dod par gtogs pa'i spong ba la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis rnam par bshad pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pas ni 'dod par gtogs pa'i spong ba la /
translated: In the explanation of others, the perseverance for Dharma knowledge abandons the afflictions of the desire realm and the perseverance for subsequent knowledge abandons the afflictions of the higher realms.üîΩSo how could one abandon one hundred and eight afflictions with one?

original: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas ni khams gong ma'i 'o zhes pas ji ltar na gcig gis brgya rtsa brgyad spong ste zhog cig / skabs su bab pa brjod pa ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs zhes pa 'di'i rnam par 'phel ba'i gnas skabs su ni rgyun gyis
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas ni khams gong ma'i 'o zhes pas ji ltar na gcig gis brgya rtsa brgyad spong ste zhog cig / skabs su bab pa brjod pa ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs zhes pa 'di'i rnam par 'phel ba'i gnas skabs su ni rgyun gyis
translated: The explanation of the present context is that at the stage of the peak, the perseverance for Dharma knowledge abandons the one hundred and eight afflictions of the desire realm and the perseverance for subsequent knowledge abandons the one hundred and eight afflictions of the higher realms.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'o zhes mngon par 'dod pa ste gzhan du ni ci zhig 'dis sa thams cad du yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'o zhes mngon par 'dod pa ste gzhan du ni ci zhig 'dis sa thams cad du yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is not conceptual.

original: de ltar gyur pas rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs su ni rnam pa thams cad du mi srid do //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs su ni rnam pa thams cad du mi srid do //
translated: Thus, the conceptual thought of the realization of the bodhisattva is not possible in any way during the stage of the acceptance of the world system.

original: de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ltung ba ni dogs pa yang med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ltung ba ni dogs pa yang med la /
translated: Therefore, there is no danger of falling into nirvana,

original: kun mkhyen pa gsum gyi chos rnams kyi bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: kun mkhyen pa gsum gyi chos rnams kyi bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no //
translated: and the three knowledges of the omniscient one are not complete.

original: ji ltar yang skad cig ma gcig gi mthong ba'i lam la rtogs pa po rnam pa bzhi rnams gang gis de'i gnyen po rnam pa bzhi par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar yang skad cig ma gcig gi mthong ba'i lam la rtogs pa po rnam pa bzhi rnams gang gis de'i gnyen po rnam pa bzhi par 'gyur te /
translated: How can the four realizers be in the path of seeing in one moment, since the four antidotes would be simultaneous?

original: chos shes pa'i bzod pas ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa la yang med la /
analyzed: chos shes pa'i bzod pas ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa la yang med la /
translated: The acceptance of the knowledge of the teaching does not have the afflictions of the form and formless realms.

original: de yongs su sgrub pa'i mngon par rtogs pas gzhan du byas nas rnam par gzhag pa 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yongs su sgrub pa'i mngon par rtogs pas gzhan du byas nas rnam par gzhag pa 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It would be contradictory to posit that the path of seeing is established by the clear realization that fully establishes it.

original: gang du lam la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma nyid ni 'dir mthong ba'i lam ste /
analyzed: gang du lam la rjes su shes pa'i skad cig ma nyid ni 'dir mthong ba'i lam ste /
translated: The moment of subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path is the path of seeing.

original: chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig rnams kyis @186b ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba la ltos par khams gsum pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i tshig ni rigs so zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig rnams kyis @186b ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba la ltos par khams gsum pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i tshig ni rigs so zhes gsungs la /
translated: The statement that the moments of perseverance for Dharma knowledge abandon afflictions of the desire realm and the statement that the moments of perseverance for subsequent knowledge abandon the three realms are correct.

original: de'i sun 'byin pa ni snga nas kyang brjod zin to //
analyzed: de'i sun 'byin pa ni snga nas kyang brjod zin to //
translated: We have already refuted this.üîΩSome assert that the path of meditation has nine specific realizations.

original: 'dir kha cig gi 'dod pas bsgom pa'i lam la rtogs pa'i bye brag dgu nyid de de la chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bye brag rtogs par 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i sa dgu po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bye brag chen po dgu lan cig gis spong bar
analyzed: 'dir kha cig gi 'dod pas bsgom pa'i lam la rtogs pa'i bye brag dgu nyid de de la chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bye brag rtogs par 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i sa dgu po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bye brag chen po dgu lan cig gis spong bar
translated: They assert that the nine specific afflictions of the nine levels such as the desire realm are abandoned at once by the weak-weak realization.

original: 'gyur te / ji srid du rtogs pa chen po'i chen pos nyon mongs pa'i bye brag chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dgu spong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gyur te / ji srid du rtogs pa chen po'i chen pos nyon mongs pa'i bye brag chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dgu spong bar 'gyur te /
translated: That is not so, because the great of the great realization would abandon the nine types of affliction, such as the small of the small.

analyzed: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid kho na de'i de bzhin nyid dang don dam pa ste /

original: bden pa nyid dang mi bden pa nyid la sogs pa'i spros pas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bden pa nyid dang mi bden pa nyid la sogs pa'i spros pas stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: ma rig pa'i bag chags zad pas de dang bral ba ni gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i dngos po ste /

analyzed: 'khrul pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig pa'i ye shes ni byang chub bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that enlightenment is the pristine wisdom which is of one taste in the relative and ultimate, free from all error.

original: yang gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa ni /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa la byang chub ces pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa la byang chub ces pa ste /
translated: Enlightenment is that which is realized by the Buddhas.

original: yang chos nyid kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: yang chos nyid kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
translated: Again, from the point of view of reality, it is said:üîΩBecause it is to be realized by the Buddhas, it is called enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs par bya bas de'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba ni rtogs par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi las la ste /

analyzed: rab kyi mthar son pa ni de bzhin gshegs par gzung bar bya la /

analyzed: de yang phung po lnga po rnams kyis stong pa nyid kho na'o //

analyzed: byang chub ni de'i de rnams dang rang rang gis kyang stong pa nyid pas 'dzin pa ma yin pa la gang yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba med cing dbye ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: Enlightenment is empty of those and of itself, so it is not an apprehender. There is no division of apprehended and apprehender, and yet it is not that there is no division.

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med @189b pa dag ni dngos po'i chos kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med @189b pa dag ni dngos po'i chos kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because difference and nondifference are qualities of things.

original: de'i phyir na rnam pa med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir na rnam pa med pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is not without aspects,üîΩand yet it is not even with aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin zhes pa ji ltar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub bo zhes pa ni legs par sgrub pa la /

original: bden pas ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa spong gi / don dam pa ni phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tha dad dang tha dad la sogs pa'i spros pa mtha' dag pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa la
analyzed: bden pas ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa spong gi / don dam pa ni phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tha dad dang tha dad la sogs pa'i spros pa mtha' dag pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa la
translated: The ultimate is the absence of the false imagination of all the elaborations of the difference and nondifference of the apprehended and apprehender of the aggregates and so on.

analyzed: yongs su dag pa'i kun rdzob ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub ste /

analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang gdul bya kha cig la yang ldog pas phye nas rnam par gzhag pa'o //

analyzed: ma rig pa dang bcas nas skyes pa'i chos rnams thams cad ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir gzung ba la sogs pa ldog pas rang rig pa la sogs pa ldog par tshad mas nges pas ma brtags nyams gzung ba la sogs pa dang
translated: Since it is ascertained by a valid cognition that all phenomena that arise with ignorance are ultimately empty of inherent existence, the object, etc., are reversed, and thus self-awareness, etc., are reversed.

analyzed: rang rig pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob tu rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the object, etc., and self-awareness, etc., should be posited conventionally.üîΩFor those who have not realized this, those who possess a valid cognition that realizes something about entities, it is otherwise.

original: ma rtogs pa la ni dngos po la cung zhig rtogs pa'i tshad ma dang ldan pa la ni gzhan du 'dir cung zhig ni kun rdzob pa la cung zhig ni dngos po'o zhes te /

original: rgya cher spros pas dgos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rgya cher spros pas dgos pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no need for extensive elaboration.

original: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yul la rnam par dag pa'i blos stong pa nyid du rtogs pa de nyid chos dkon mchog ces pa ni chos dkon mchog go //

analyzed: 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ste /

analyzed: de yang sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las thams cad de'i khongs su gtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa de ni mi 'thad de /

analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gis rtogs zhes pa ni log par sgrub pa la /
translated: With respect to the line ‚ÄúBy what is it realized?‚Äù it is said that

analyzed: chos thams cad mi phyed ces pa ni rjes su dran pa drug ste /

original: chos thams cad sems kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos thams cad sems kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir te /

original: de rnams dbyer mi phyed pas nyid de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de rnams dbyer mi phyed pas nyid de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir te /

original: de ltar na yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de ltar na yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
translated: Thus, beginning with the generation of the first thought of enlightenment,

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams kyis chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhag par mos pa'i chos rjes su dran pa sgom par byed cing /

analyzed: gzhan yang de la rab tu 'god par byed la /

analyzed: de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub nas chos bstan pas sems can thar par byed pa med do //
translated: And that is because, being essentially insubstantial, all phenomena are fully awakened and then liberate sentient beings by teaching the Dharma.

analyzed: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la byed la /

original: don dam par ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: don dam par ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: de rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na dge ba'i chos rnams la @192a * //

analyzed: de rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir de ltar yid la mi byed do zhes pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o //

analyzed: gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun skyes bu chen po'i gang zag brgyad rnams te /
translated: Here, the Sa·πÖgha of irreversible bodhisattvas and the Sa·πÖgha of ≈õrƒÅvakas, the eight persons who are great beings,

analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni yod pa ma yin no zhes pa la mi byed pa ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: are not essentially existent. Not paying attention to them is the recollection of the Sa·πÖgha.

translated: Then, when they practice the perfection of wisdom,üîΩthey do not pay attention to the Buddha,

analyzed: ma nyams shing skyon med la ma 'dres shing lhad ma zhugs pa /

original: gzhan du rnyog par ma gyur cing 'dra 'drer ma song ba la smad pa'i mkhas pas bsngags shing shin tu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan du rnyog par ma gyur cing 'dra 'drer ma song ba la smad pa'i mkhas pas bsngags shing shin tu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa nyid de /

original: de'i tshul khrims dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la bya'o zhes pa de ltar yid la mi byed pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshul khrims dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la bya'o zhes pa de ltar yid la mi byed pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o //

original: de la ma nyams pa ni mi 'phra ba ste /
analyzed: de la ma nyams pa ni mi 'phra ba ste /

original: bslab pa mang po las ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bslab pa mang po las ma 'das pa'o //

analyzed: skyon med pa ni ji ltar blangs pa la gcig la yang mi 'da' ba'o //

analyzed: ma 'dres pa ni srid pa'i spyod pa phyir ma bsngos pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: lhad ma zhugs pa ni mi dge ba nyid dang 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ma nyams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gang de rnyog par ma gyur pa ste /
translated: That morality which has the qualities of being unimpaired, etc., is unclouded.

original: sred pa len pa la sems can thar par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sred pa len pa la sems can thar par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de'i phyir na 'phags pa rnams kyi bsngags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ldog par mi 'gyur te /
