analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems pas mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Because of his intention to be ethical, he is in equipoise.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na zang zing dang chos te bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag kyang gtong zhing /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na zang zing dang chos te bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag kyang gtong zhing /
translated: When he practices the perfection of wisdom, he gives away his own limbs and minor parts, both material and spiritual.

original: de thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas so zhes de ltar yid la mi byed pa ni rtog pa rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: de thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed pas so zhes de ltar yid la mi byed pa ni rtog pa rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: Since he mentally engages with all of them as having the essence of the absence of entityness, he does not mentally engage with them in that way. This is the recollection of concepts.

original: gang de rgyun du zhugs pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs rnams ji srid du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes pa de rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes pas dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa
analyzed: gang de rgyun du zhugs pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs rnams ji srid du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes pa de rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes pas dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa
translated: He is mindful and does not mentally engage with the fact that all those who are stream-enterers and those born as gods from the Catur¬≠mahƒÅ¬≠rƒÅja¬≠kƒÅyikas up to the Para¬≠nirmita¬≠va≈õa¬≠vartins are the essence of the absence of entityness.

original: ni lha rnams rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: ni lha rnams rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: is the recollection of the gods.

original: de ltar rjes su dran pa drug po rnams ni mthar gyis pa'i bya ba drug go //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dran pa drug po rnams ni mthar gyis pa'i bya ba drug go //
translated: Thus, these six recollections are the six sequential activities.

original: chos thams cad 'byung @192b ba med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir na chos te /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'byung @192b ba med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir na chos te /
translated: Because all dharmas are non-arising, a dharma is so called because it holds its own characteristic.

original: phung po lnga la sogs pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni de ltar chos rnams thams cad la /
analyzed: phung po lnga la sogs pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni de ltar chos rnams thams cad la /
translated: From the five aggregates up to the knowledge of all modes, all dharmas are thus.

original: de rnams 'byung ba med pa ma skyes pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mang du byung bar shes pas ni mthar gyis pa'i bya ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'byung ba med pa ma skyes pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mang du byung bar shes pas ni mthar gyis pa'i bya ba shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the sequential activity through the knowledge that those are non-arising, that they are not produced, that they are not entities.

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Moreover, one who practices the perfection of wisdom, beginning with the production of the thought of enlightenment,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhag par smos pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom par byed cing /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du lhag par smos pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom par byed cing /
translated: By the special mention of the naturelessness of all things, he meditates on the applications of mindfulness up to the knowledge of all modes.

original: de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa med pas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing theg pa gsum po rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni chos thams
analyzed: de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa med pas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing theg pa gsum po rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni chos thams
translated: And since they are natureless, he turns the wheel of the Dharma, since all things are unarisen, and he liberates beings from cyclic existence by means of the three vehicles.

original: cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pa ste mthar gyis pa zhes bya ba bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pa ste mthar gyis pa zhes bya ba bcu gsum mo //
translated: This is the thirteenth stage, called the ‚ÄúStage of the Naturelessness of All Things.‚Äù

original: 'di'i gang gi klan ka ni rang bzhin nyid kyis bsams shing /
analyzed: 'di'i gang gi klan ka ni rang bzhin nyid kyis bsams shing /
translated: The objection to this is to be understood by implication.

original: lan ni / rgyus kyis btab par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lan ni / rgyus kyis btab par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The reply is to be stated by implication.

original: gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sgom par byed na /
analyzed: gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sgom par byed na /
translated: If one meditates on the perfections, etc., as empty of intrinsic reality,

original: de na ni de bsgom pa don med do //
analyzed: de na ni de bsgom pa don med do //
translated: In that case, the cultivation of that would be pointless.

original: ri bong gi rva bsgom pa bzhin no zhes pa ni klan ka la /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva bsgom pa bzhin no zhes pa ni klan ka la /
translated: It is like cultivating the horn of a rabbit.

original: lan gsum pa ni /
analyzed: lan gsum pa ni /
translated: This is the third objection.

original: chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mnyam pa nyid ces pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mnyam pa nyid ces pa ste /
translated: The response is: ‚ÄúAll phenomena are the same in being changeless.‚Äù

original: 'gyur ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings te rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med pas de mnyam pa ste ro gcig pa la /
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings te rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med pas de mnyam pa ste ro gcig pa la /
translated: The changelessness is the dharmadhƒÅtu, which is naturally devoid of essence. That is the same, of one taste,

original: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i chos rnams thams cad dang / de'i bdag nyid kyi don dam pa'i chos nyid la bsgom par bya ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i chos rnams thams cad dang / de'i bdag nyid kyi don dam pa'i chos nyid la bsgom par bya ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ste /
translated: and all phenomena, which are the entities of the conventional, and the ultimate reality, which is their nature, are not objects of meditation. They are the causes of the qualities of ƒÅryas.

original: de ji ltar na don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ji ltar na don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: How could they be pointless?

original: 'o na so sor rang rig pa'i bdag nyid dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rig pa yang yod la /
analyzed: 'o na so sor rang rig pa'i bdag nyid dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rig pa yang yod la /
translated: Well then, the cognition that is reflexive awareness and the apprehending cognition exist,

original: de las gzung ba yang yod ces pas chos rnams thams cad la ngo bo nyid med pa mi rigs so zhes pa ni klan ka la /
analyzed: de las gzung ba yang yod ces pas chos rnams thams cad la ngo bo nyid med pa mi rigs so zhes pa ni klan ka la /
translated: and because of that, the apprehended also exists. Therefore it is illogical that all phenomena are essenceless. This is the objection.üîΩThe response is: ‚ÄúThe cognition that is reflexive awareness and the apprehending cognition do not exist.‚Äù

original: lan ni / chos thams cad bdag med cing rnam par rig pa med do zhes pa ste bdag nyid rtag pa gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni kun rdzob tu yang yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: lan ni / chos thams cad bdag med cing rnam par rig pa med do zhes pa ste bdag nyid rtag pa gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni kun rdzob tu yang yod pa ma yin la /
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúAll phenomena are selfless and without awareness,‚Äù that is, the nature of a permanent, single self does not exist even conventionally,

original: rnam par rig pa'i rnam par shes pa ni don dam par med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa'i rnam par shes pa ni don dam par med pa ste /
translated: and the awareness of consciousness does not exist ultimately.

original: gang du shes rab kyi rjes su rtogs pa'i tshad mas nges @193a * //
analyzed: gang du shes rab kyi rjes su rtogs pa'i tshad mas nges @193a * //
translated: Where is it ascertained by the valid knowledge that realizes wisdom?

original: la / 'dir 'dzin pa po med pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pas te /
analyzed: la / 'dir 'dzin pa po med pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pas te /
translated: Here, since there is no apprehender, there is no object apprehended.

original: rten cing 'brel ba las skyes pa'i phyir dang / gcig pa dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du grub ste /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel ba las skyes pa'i phyir dang / gcig pa dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du grub ste /
translated: Since they are produced in dependence, and since they are free from being one or many, all phenomena are established as being without inherent nature.

original: gzugs la sogs pa sgra rnams kyis gang rjod par byed pa de nyid gzugs la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa sgra rnams kyis gang rjod par byed pa de nyid gzugs la sogs pa ste /
translated: Whatever is expressed by the terms ‚Äúform‚Äù and so on is just form and so on.

original: de dag ni yod pas gang du ngo bo nyid med pa yin zhes pa ni klan ka la /
analyzed: de dag ni yod pas gang du ngo bo nyid med pa yin zhes pa ni klan ka la /
translated: Since they exist, how can they be without inherent nature?

original: lan ni / ming tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lan ni / ming tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The answer is ‚Äúmere names‚Äù and so on.

original: don gyis stong pa'i ming ni ming tsam la /
analyzed: don gyis stong pa'i ming ni ming tsam la /
translated: A name that is empty of an object is a mere name.

original: des chos de rnams la thams cad mngon par rjod par byed de /
analyzed: des chos de rnams la thams cad mngon par rjod par byed de /
translated: It expresses all those phenomena.

original: des na de rnams tha snyad du yod do zhe na /
analyzed: des na de rnams tha snyad du yod do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, they exist conventionally.

original: min te / de ni gang du yang med de /
analyzed: min te / de ni gang du yang med de /
translated: No, because it does not exist anywhere.

original: don med pas gang du yang rjod pa po med pa'i phyir dang / rjod par byed pa yang gang du yang med de /
analyzed: don med pas gang du yang rjod pa po med pa'i phyir dang / rjod par byed pa yang gang du yang med de /
translated: Since it is nonexistent, there is no one anywhere who expresses it, and there is no expression anywhere.

original: lus kyi 'am /
analyzed: lus kyi 'am /
translated: It is not in the body.

original: sems la brjod par bya ba dang rjod byed dag med pas so //
analyzed: sems la brjod par bya ba dang rjod byed dag med pas so //
translated: It is not in the mind, because there is neither that which is to be expressed nor that which expresses it.

original: chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: The summary is stated in the line ‚Äúall phenomena‚Äù and so forth.

original: tha snyad med par ni brjod pa med pa ste /
analyzed: tha snyad med par ni brjod pa med pa ste /
translated: Without conventions, there is no expression.

original: 'di rnams la de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams la de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those do not exist in these phenomena.

original: de'i phyir na brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na brjod du med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, they are inexpressible.

original: 'o na gzugs la sogs pa rnams la tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyang tshad ma dang ldan pa la de ltar de la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'dod pa zhes
analyzed: 'o na gzugs la sogs pa rnams la tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyang tshad ma dang ldan pa la de ltar de la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'dod pa zhes
translated: Now, since form and so forth are endowed with valid cognition, emptiness is also endowed with valid cognition, and thus the perfection of wisdom that observes it becomes endowed with a measure,

original: pa la / lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: pa la / lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: the reply is given:

original: chos thams cad la tshad med ces pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la tshad med ces pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are immeasurable.

original: chos rnams thams cad la ni tshad med de /
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad la ni tshad med de /
translated: All phenomena are immeasurable,

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' lta bu nyid de /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' lta bu nyid de /
translated: because they are devoid of inherent nature, like space itself.

original: des na de'i stong pa nyid rnams kyang tshad med la /
analyzed: des na de'i stong pa nyid rnams kyang tshad med la /
translated: Therefore, their emptiness is also immeasurable,

analyzed: gal te phung po la sogs pa med na gang gis 'di brjod par 'gyur zhes pa ni klan ka la /
translated: If the aggregates and so forth do not exist, by what would this be expressed? This is an objection.

original: lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: The reply is given:

original: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o zhes pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are signless.

original: mtshan mas sgro btags pa'i rang gi mtshan ma med pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan mas sgro btags pa'i rang gi mtshan ma med pa ste /
translated: It is devoid of the characteristics that are imputed by characteristics.

original: mtshan ma nub cing chos thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa 'di la /
analyzed: mtshan ma nub cing chos thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa 'di la /
translated: In this, where characteristics subside and all phenomena are devoid of essence like illusions,

original: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /

translated: The extremely pure reality of the buddhas is like the orb of the sun, and the perfection of wisdom that is its nature is like the sun's rays, pervading the ten directions with the essence of infinite gnosis.
